import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../models/product'; import { products } from '../products'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent { // when components load, get cart from local storage cart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart') || '[]'); constructor() { localStorage.setItem('cart', '[]'); } ngOnInit(): void { } }
